item.title: Capstone Green Energy Corp 10-K
item.description: Capstone Green Energy Corp, which is in the Engines & Turbines [3510] industry, SEC 10-K filing on July 14, 2022 had 35982 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations.
